summary: The staff and robe of Liberlath the witch.
descriptionHtml:
While very gifted in the arcane arts, [color=#a4c2f4]Liberlath[/color] actively avoids destruction magic, prefering a less hands-on approach for keeping threats at a distance.

This mod contains a [color=#a4c2f4]staff[/color] and [color=#a4c2f4]robes [/color]retextured in a light blue colour.

To find the items, turn right after the Riverwood bridge and follow the road to Whiterun until you find a small quest.

You can craft the robes by sewing together four pieces of linen and dying them with a mixture of bone meal and a squished chaurus egg.
author: Sbrodolino
